name: jugdish
text: the lines roast beef relays are like my favorite things ever.

name: billyamericana
text: There is nothing one should be realer about than one's beef with variables. Bitch-ass tricks, those things.

name: ssddr
text: Algebra rap, properly produced and marketed, could really shift the paradigm in music industry.

name: zeroasalimit
text: Should we think of Algebra Rap as some sort of dark underside to Nerdcore? I mean, it ain't nerdy to hate on algebra, but that knowledge is tight.

name: bixschmix
text: When I was in elementary school in the ghetto, we had "Multiplication Rap" cassette tapes we listened to. Those seven times tables were kickin' .

name: lux
text: In my elementary school we had to memorize the capitals of South America with this real cheesy Latina lady singing with maracas and a bell. After every name, a maraca shake; after every country, a bell. Bells still make me want to recite, "Buenos Aires, Chile. Lima, Peru."

name: sirfrederick
text: But, but... Buenos Aires isn't the capital of Chile!

name: lux
text: ARGH it's Argentina. I am a fool.

name: libelandslander
text: ha ha apparently it did not work very well

name: fakedaisies
text:
My boyfriend sings this song, I think. He always says "Lima, PERU. Lima, PERU. Bogota, Colombia. Lima, PERU."

Of course, he may just be insane.

name: berami
text: I just got halfway through typing "Oh! I think we had that too!" and rattling off a bunch of lyrics before I realized all I was writing were numbers. Lyrical genius.

name: mountaindewtab
text: algebra is not straight forward is what they are saying

name: thrasher
text: he hates pronumerals so he claims they are unnecessary

name: artvandelay
text: straight up

name: tibcoolbreeze
text: Between this strip and the next, Little Nephew's material goes from number-crunching to bozack-flaying.

name: mog
text:
Plus his rhymes are extremely tight


extremely

name: epicurus
text: Ray is old fashioned; he wants to defend algebra even if he doesn't understand it. I have to say that the rhymes in the last panel do tickle me sometimes at innapropriate moments and I have been known to chuckle!

name: sp1derbaby
text: A woman is more like an argument.

name: riazm
text: underchubbied comment.

name: numberkillinger
text: The concept of a woman / can take it in the dumper.

name: jollysaintpete
text: guaranteed that lame is from a chick AMIRITE

name: greenkoolayd
text: thats hot, yo.

name: spicyponyhead
text:
If Little Nephew went on tour, I think these guys would be the opening band. http://youtube.com/watch?v=BipvGD-LCjU

You know, just for pro-math, anti-math tension.

name: boredom_man
text: I think I just tried to beat up my monitor for its lunch money. That's some dangerous clip you linkin' to.

name: aaron_haynes
text: 5 is what's on my mind.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: "a woman is like a variable" is one of the most strip-enhancing hypertexts ever.

name: epicurus
text: What I like about the lyric that Beef quotes is that it makes algebra seem like a duplicitous, unstable wreck that LN is trying to gently help out... for its own good.
